WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

for certain time formats PHPExcel creates the wrong text string, if I use for instance getFormattedValue().

The reason is that Excel supports the time format "MM:SS" which means minutes:seconds
However, PHPExcel checks for minutes by using ":MM" which this one does not pass, of course.
from what I could tell the correct checks would be H:MM or MM:S or something similiar. Maybe checking for ":MM" or "MM:" would be enough.
WorkItem.Summary: value formatting for certain time formats not correct (MM:SS)
